content: p1 k1 sm k7 abbreviations k = knit p = purl st s = stitch es pm = place marker sm = slip marker rs = right side ws = wrong side tbl = through the back loop k2tog = knit 2 sts together p2tog = purl 2 sts together st s = stitch es kfb = knit into the front and the back of the stitch to make an increase p l y m o u t h y a r n® f989 free pattern with our compliments find inspiration www plymouthyarn com page 9 row 8 k7 sm p1 * k1 p3 repeat from * to last 10 sts k1 p2 sm k7 repeat row 1-8 --- 3 times more then row 1- 2 for a total of 34 row worked ending with a ws row divider row knit 4 row slipping markers as you work stripe 4 diamonds by eileen - 36 row row 1 k7 sm knit to last 7 sts sm k7 row 2 k7 sm purl to last 7 sts sm k7 row 3 rs k7 sm k1 * k4 p3 k3 repeat from * to last 8 sts k1 sm k7 row 4 ws k7 sm p1 * p2 k2 p1 k2 p3 repeat from * to last 8 sts p1 sm k7 row 5 k7 sm k1 * k2 p2 k3 p2 k1 repeat from * to last 8 sts k1 sm k7 row 6 k7 sm p1 * k2 p5 k2 p1 repeat from * to last 8 sts p1 sm k7 row 7 k7 sm k1 * p2 k7 p1 repeat from * to last 8 sts k1 sm k7 row 8 k7 sm p1 * k2 p5 k2 p1 repeat from * to last 8 sts p1 sm k7 row 9 k7 sm k1 * k2 p2 k3 p2 k1 repeat from * to last 8 sts k1 sm k7 row 10 k7 sm p1 * p2 k2 p1 k2 p3 repeat from * to last 8 sts p1 sm k7 row 11-34 repeat row 3-10 --- 3 times row 35 k7 sm k1 * k4 p3 k3 repeat from * to last 8 sts k1 sm k7 row 36 k7 sm purl to last 7 sts sm k7 total of 36 row worked ending with a ws row divider row knit 4 row slipping markers as you work stripe 5 vertical dashes- linda 36 row row 1 rs k7 sm * p2 k1tbl p3 repeat from * to last 7 sts sm k7 row 2 ws k7 sm * k3 p1tbl k2 repeat from * to last 7 sts sm k7 row 3 k7 sm * p2 k1tbl p3 repeat from * to last 7 sts sm k7 row 4 k7 sm * k3 p1tbl k2 repeat from * to last 7 sts sm k7 row 5 k7 sm * p2 k1tbl p3 repeat from * to last 7 sts sm k7 row 6 k7 sm * k3
